DOC.brief_summary: This study assess safety/tolerability , PK/PD LCZ696 patient stable heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics ( PK/PD ) LCZ696 Patients With Stable Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Patients document heart failure ( NYHA class IIIV ) Use ACEi ARB , ACEi DRI , ARB DRI treatment , three medication Screening
